videos.description:
The Gravel Earth Series documentary is now a reality.
We present to you the first episode: a visual journey through some of the most intense and spectacular landscapes of the season.
This episode features two key events — Santa Vall, in the heart of Girona, and The Hills, in Italy’s Treviso region. These two races not only stand out for their stunning natural settings but also for bringing together the highest number of professional athletes so far this season.
This is a gripping documentary that captures the raw, unfiltered essence of gravel racing: effort, emotion, and wild terrain. Dirt, sweat, and soul.
Don’t miss it. Welcome to the Gravel Earth Series.
See you in the next episode, focused on The Traka — our second chapter.

videos.title: 2025 Life Time UNBOUND Gravel presented by Shimano Race Highlights
videos.description:
Watch the full Race Highlights of the 2025 Life Time Grand Prix’s second stop at Life Time UNBOUND Gravel presented by Shimano. With the fastest gravel riders on the planet and unexpected twists and turns throughout the whole day, there was no telling what was coming next.
 
From the women’s 4-up sprint between Sofia Gomez Villafane, Rosa Kloser, Cecile Lejeune, and Lauren De Crescenzo to two new north course records being broken, race day in Emporia was absolutely buzzing. 
 
Unexpected breakaways, historic records, wrong turns, and so much more… 
 
🎥 Watch now and follow along as the 2025 Life Time Grand Prix unfolds. 
 
Official podium jersey brought to you by Pas Normal Studios. 
 
Learn more about the Life Time Grand Prix: lifetimegrandprix.com 
Learn more about Life Time UNBOUND Gravel presented by Shimano: unboundgravel.com
